entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 28 January 2023
